duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement swine health programs for endemic, emerging, regulatory, and foreign animal diseases.
Collaborate with staff for research responsibilities and project management.
Develop and deliver educational material for producers and veterinarians in FAD and research projects.
Manage external contractors and provide subject matter expertise with respect to swine health issues.
Participate in long-range planning and budgeting regarding swine health programs.
Serve as a subject matter expert on swine health information for internal staff, external groups, and industry partners.
